answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Tabitha – I hope the links below are helpful:
Union City Facility Rental Policy Handbook
http://www.ci.union-city.ca.us/leisure/leisure.pdf/Facility%20Use%20Handbook.pdf

http://www.bunnellcity.us/docs/Finance-Form-10-Facility-Rental-Policies-and-Procedures.pdf

http://www.fostercity.org/Services/facilities/Facility-Rental-Inforamtion.cfm 
City of Euless Parks & Community Services Department Facility Rental Policy
http://www.eulesstx.gov/pacs/docs/Facility%20Rental%20Policy.pdf?v=2012-06-12 
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director

author: Tabitha Riley
text: Culpeper County Parks and Recreation has been gifted a small community room of 35’ X 40’.  The department is planning on renting the room for public use in the future.  Staff is seeking prices other organizations have established for a room of the same or closely related dimensions to develop a rental policy.
title: Facility rental rates?
